channel.title: Need help disableing certain spawned items heres what i have

item.title: Need help disableing certain spawned items heres what i have
item.dc:creator: @sordsmen123 sordsmen123
item.description:
@sordsmen123 wrote:

im trying to limit the amount of items spawned and i have this…but it doesnt work. can some 1 help?

}if (cmd[0].equals("item")) { if (p.rights <= 1) { if (p.duelFight()) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn items while dueling."); return; } if (Server.engine.wildernessArea(p.absX, p.absY)) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn items in the wilderness."); return; } } Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), Integer.parseInt(cmd[2])); } else { if (cmd[0].contains("11283, 6570, 11696, 11700, 11698, 11694, 11235, 4153")) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn this item, Kill For It!."); }

Read full topic

item.title: Need help disableing certain spawned items heres what i have
item.dc:creator: @sordsmen123 sordsmen123
item.description:
@sordsmen123 wrote:

so itd be like this?

}if (cmd[0].equals("item")) { if (p.rights <= 1) { if (p.duelFight()) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn items while dueling."); return; } if (Server.engine.wildernessArea(p.absX, p.absY)) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn items in the wilderness."); return; } } Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), Integer.parseInt(cmd[2])); } else { if (cmd[0].contains("11283" || "6570" || "11696" || "11700" || "11698" || "11694" || "11235" || "4153" )) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn this item, Kill For It!."); return false; }

item.title: Need help disableing certain spawned items heres what i have
item.dc:creator: @sordsmen123 sordsmen123
item.description:
@sordsmen123 wrote:

may someone please help me fix spawning on my 508, i only wanted a few items unspawnable. Heres what i have but it doesnt work.

}if (cmd[0].equals("item")) { if (p.rights <= 1) { if (p.duelFight()) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn items while dueling."); return; } if (Server.engine.wildernessArea(p.absX, p.absY)) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn items in the wilderness."); return; } } Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), Integer.parseInt(cmd[2])); } else { if (cmd[0].contains("11283" || "6570" || "11696" || "11700" || "11698" || "11694" || "11235" || "4153" )) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn this item, Kill For It!."); }
